Malaysian Students' Technology Conference
12 - 13 August 2017
Mercu UEM, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Tell Me More ======= >>>>>>> 4c1227214ec76a5bb5e48a9aa9e287f5f9247c5c

Welcoming Remarks

<<<<<<< HEAD

Building upon the successes of last year's pioneering Malaysian Students Technology Conference or MSTC for short, this year we are hoping to direct it towards one of the most transformative and disruptive events happening in our world today. The fourth industrial revolution as it has come to be known as is dramatically changing the way the world works but so few people are aware of it and much less able to stay ahead of the curve and remain competitive in a diverse and ever changing environment. With this conference, we hope to bring Malaysian students which represent the future of our country together with experts in the relevant fields such as big data analytics, cyber-physical systems and many more up and coming fields which we feel the future leaders of our country should have a strong grasp of. =======

Antecedents instalments of Malaysian Students Technology Conference (MSTC) have been breakthrough by their own rights; the first being the pioneer and the second being the innovator. MSTC has and always will be a platform to congregate motivated students who are passionate about current and future technology and its impact on society. In the third instalment this year, we are shaping the conference to be interactive and impactful; coherent to our desire to be one of the most transformative and distruptive events happening in our world nowadays. As the Fourth Industrial Revolution is changing the world we know today, breakthroughs are being forged right in the very heart of the revolution. We are hoping to demonstrate the breakthroughs in technology that mankind has achieved thus far through the discovery of something by exploration and its significance. With shared experience from experts in numerous fields such as big data analytics, cybersecurity as well as many more up and coming fields, we are confident that MSTC is the platform to achieve this aspiration. >>>>>>> 4c1227214ec76a5bb5e48a9aa9e287f5f9247c5c

Ganesh Pramod
Coordinator of MSTC 2017
University of Manchester
